mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_stats (id, full_short_url, gid, date, pv, uv, uip, hour, weekday, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{id}, #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{pv}, #{uv}, #{uip}, #{hour}, #{weekday}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pv = pv + #{pv}, uv = uv + #{uv}, uip = uip + #{uip}, update_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT date, SUM(pv) AS pv, SUM(uv) AS uv, SUM(uip) AS uip FROM t_link_access_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{gid} AND date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY full_short_url, gid, `date`
